page.title: 04A RECREATION SURVEY
page.content: How much time do the people of Annfield Plain spend on recreational activities and what do they do? 7-11 YEARS Average 28 hours per week MOST POPULAR CLUB Clavering Y.C. MOST POPULAR SPORT Swimming MOST POPULAR INDOOR ACTIVITY Collecting things,Watching T.V. 12-18 YEARS Average 32 hours per week MOST POPULAR CLUB Oxhill Y.C. MOST POPULAR SPORTS Swimming,Karate MOST POPULAR INDOOR ACTIVITIES Snooker,Computer games and Reading 19-40 YEARS Average 27 hours per week MOST POPULAR SPORTS Swimming,football MOST POPULAR INDOOR ACTIVITIES Darts, Snooker,Pool,Dominoes,Bowls,Reading 41 PLUS Average 28 hours per week MOST POPULAR SPORTS Bowls,Cricket MOST POPULAR ACTIVITIES Gardening,Reading,Knitting
